item.description:
Guys,

I just found out that Charles Cannon and Kayaking has stand up paddle boards. I definitely want to do it next weekend. Get a extra pair of cloths as we will surly get wet.

For now I am posting locations as One main st. near MIT T stop, but I might change it to place near Harvard.

People who want to do just kayaking/cannon can join me. It is definitely going to be fun.

Finally, don't get scared because you don't know swimming. Even I don't know swimming, you will wear life west and easily get on surf board if you have confidence. This will be my fist time too and I am excited.

check this video for SUP instructions.


http://www.youtube.co...

btw : Charles Cannon and Kayaking has free parking.
item.name: stand up paddle surfing
